scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run db:start" "npm run sam:start" "npm run vite:dev"
scripts.db:start: docker run -d -p 8000:8000 --name dynamodb-local amazon/dynamodb-local || docker start dynamodb-local
scripts.setup: npm run db:start && timeout /t 3 /nobreak && npm run db:setup
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sam build && sam deploy && npm run deploy:frontend
